Package com.opensymphony.workflow.query

Class Summary
Expression Abstract base class for expressions used in a workflow query.
FieldExpression Field expressions are used when constructing a workflow query on the fields of persistent workflow instances like (START_DATE, OWNER,....).
NestedExpression Nested expressions are used when constructing a workflow query.
WorkflowExpressionQuery Workflow Query.
WorkflowQuery Deprecated. use WorkflowExpressionQuery instead
